nodes.description: 周一下午莫斯科多莫迪多沃机场发生炸弹爆炸，造成35人死亡、160余人重伤
nodes.support_text: after a bomb exploded Monday afternoon, killing 35 and sending more than 160 badly injured

nodes.description: 确认一名44岁保加利亚籍奥地利的自杀袭击者尼科莱伊·伊凡诺夫·伊凡诺夫死亡，其遗体由俄罗斯紧急事务部识别
nodes.support_text: Nikolay Ivanov Ivanov was traveling from Vienna with Lauda Air; his body was identified by the Russian Ministry of Emergencies

nodes.description: 保加利亚外交部向尼科莱伊·伊凡诺夫的家属通报消息
nodes.support_text: The Bulgarian Ministry of Foreign Affairs has informed his family

nodes.description: 莫斯科医院接收至少180名伤员，部分伤员处于危急状况
nodes.support_text: Some 180 persons have been wounded in the Domodedovo attack, some of them are in critical condition

nodes.description: 确认两名英国公民在袭击中遇难，另有其他非俄罗斯公民伤员被收治
nodes.support_text: At least two British nationals were among those killed, with a number of other non-Russian citizens among those accepted in Moscow hospitals

nodes.description: 保加利亚总统和总理向俄罗斯民众及受害者表示哀悼，谴责袭击行为
nodes.support_text: Bulgarian President Georgi Parvanov and PM Boyko Borisov were among the world leaders who expressed their condolences to the Russian people and those affected by the attack

edges.support_text: after a bomb exploded Monday afternoon
his body was identified by the Russian Ministry of Emergencies
